mapper.select: select nno,ntitle,ncontent,nreadcount,regdate from (select row_number() over (order by regdate desc) num, N.* from Notice N) where num between #{row} AND #{row}+9
mapper.update: update notice set nreadcount=nreadcount+1 where nno=#{nno}
